This is my second game while participating in OneGameAMonth (#1GAM).

I have been documenting my journey and quests as an aspiring Game Developer on my blog.
You can read more about the development of this game at https://dudezord.github.io/projects/Spectrum-Attack

Thanks a lot for playing!
